actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the construction of the Westway highway project in New York and to extend until December 30, 1985, the deadline for withdrawal of approval of such project and for approval of highway and transit projects substituted for such project.

summary.text: Prohibits the use of Federal funds for construction of an Interstate route in the City of New York, New York, known as "Westway," or for the construction of any other highway on the National System of Interstate and Defense Highways which is generally on the same alignment as "Westway." Extends from September 30, 1985, to December 30, 1985, the deadline by which the Secretary of Transportation may approve route withdrawals and substitute highway and mass transit projects with respect to routes which on May 12, 1982, were under judicial injunction prohibiting their construction.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the construction of the Westway highway project in New York and to extend until December 30, 1985, the deadline for withdrawal of approval of such project and for approval of highway and transit projects substituted for such project.
